item.title: K2 Plus Upgrade Series Part 1: All-Metal Extruder Gear Kit
item.description:
Overview

Intro motivation; stock limitations; goals (reliability, higher flow, reduced wear).

Series Navigation: Part 1 (Current) Â· Part 2 (Nozzle Wiper) Â· Part 3 (Klipper & Profile)

Parts & Tools

List gear kit components, required tools, affiliate links placeholders.

Step-by-Step Installation

  1. Disassemble stock extruder
  2. Inspect drive gears & tensioner
  3. Install all-metal gear kit
  4. Reassemble & tension spring

Post-Install Calibration

  • Flow calibration â€“ see the detailed guide: Flow Calibration
  • Pressure advance tuning
    • After flow, tune pressure advance: Pressure Advance Guide

Troubleshooting

Common issues (slipping, grinding, inconsistent extrusion) and fixes.

item.title: Free 3D Printing Calculators & Tools
item.description:
Free 3D Printing Calculators & Tools

All tools are 100% free, require no registration, and run directly in your browser. Created by Mike Wilson for the 3D printing community.

Available Calculators

ðŸ§® FDM Cost Calculator

Calculate true print costs including material, electricity, time, and optional depreciation. Compare across filaments and settings for accurate pricing and planning.

Open FDM Cost Calculator

ðŸ§  OrcaSlicer Expert Assistant

Select filament, set priorities (Strength, Speed, Quality, Accuracy), and get expert recommendations for layer height, wall speed, infill, and more.

item.title: Klipper Calibration
item.description:
Minimal 3DP Klipper Calibration and Optimization Website - A Work in Progress

Launched - 2024-04-12

This section is my attempt to to create a Klipper Calibration website. It is based on my Klipper Calibration Spreadsheet

Overview

Welcome to the Klipper Calibration Hub â€“ a structured path to dial in motion, extrusion, temperature, resonance and reliability. Each guide below is purpose-built, minimal in theory, and focused on actionable measurement + adjustment.
